parameters: \nc<>I feel someone's gaze...
\nc<>The cabinet is filled with lots of scary-looking things...
\nc<>Gained <Handcuffs>!
\nc<>Gained <Rope>!
A

\nc<> The serial numbers for the <Handcuffs> and <Rope> match the
items listed on the <Mysterious Documents>!
\nc<> You've obtained the <Work Instructions Document>!
B

\nc<Exercise Employee>Succubi are great, aren't they? No need to worry about
getting fat or managing weight, right?

\nc<Exercise Employee>Hmm? I can feel it... the scent of medicine emanating from
your body...
\nc<Exercise Employee>Heh, alright.
\nc<Exercise Employee>This must be fate, take it.

\nc<Exercise Employee>It's obvious at a glance. You and I are the same kind... I
wonder who will reach the very end first. It's exciting.

\nc<Exercise Employee>As you can see, I hardly have any hair left. But even if it
takes using drugs... I'll show you that I can reach the very
end.
\nc<Exercise Employee>If you need this, come again next week. I'll always be here.
A

\nc<Exercise Staff Member>Succubi have it good, don't they? No need to worry about
getting fat or managing their weight, right?
\nc<Exercise Employee>You're back again? Here, take this.
\nc<> Gained <Modified Protein>!
\nc<Exercise Employee>If you need this, come back next week. I'm always here.
\nc<Exercise Employee>...
\nc<Exercise Employee>You might not need this right now, but... here, take it.
\nc<>Gained <Modern Elixir>!

\nc<Exercise Employee>...If you need it, come see me. I sense potential in you as
you are now.
\nc<Exercise Employee>...
\nc<Exercise Employee>If you need this, come again next week. I'm always here.

\nc<Resting Employee>"Even though it's the weekend, I can't rest without
worries... It's probably my fault for choosing a shift
system."

\nc<Resting Employee>"After all, there's nothing to do, so maybe no one will
notice if I leave work?"
